description:
A hooded puffer built for all-day, everyday comfort in the cold, wherever you roam.
An advanced thermal-reflective lining retains heat while 100% recycled polyester insulation adds warmth.
Features include PFC-free water repellency, zippered security and hand pockets, and adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem.
name: Columbia Sportswear Pike Lake Parka - Mens
